com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.tileentity.general

Interface ITileEntityHeated

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IHeated, IScienceModContent, ITileEntityScienceMod, net.minecraft.world.IWorldNameable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TEAirExtractor, TECentrifuge, TEChemReactor, TECombuster, TECondenser, TEElectrolyzer, TEGenerator, TEMachine, TEMixer, TESolarPanel, TEThermoSmelter, TEWire

    public interface ITileEntityHeated
extends IHeated, ITileEntityScienceMod, net.minecraft.world.IWorldNameable
    Interface for all ScienceMod tile entities that involve heat.
    Author:
    JasonILTG and syy1125

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Blows up the tile entity.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.minecraft.world.IWorldNameable

    • Method Detail

      • hasHeat

        boolean hasHeat()
        Returns:
        Whether the tile entity has sufficient heat to continue operation.

      • getCurrentTemp

        float getCurrentTemp()
        Returns:
        The current temperature of the tile entity

      • setCurrentTemp

        void setCurrentTemp(float temp)
        Sets the current temperature of the tile entity. Used only on the client side.
        Parameters:
        temp - The temperature

      • setFire

        void setFire()
        Sets nearby blocks on fire. Chances of being called increase as the tile entity overheats more.

      • explode

        void explode()
        Blows up the tile entity. Chances of being called increase as the tile entity overheats more.

      • setHull

        void setHull(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound hull)
        Sets the hull of the machine.
        Parameters:
        hull - The NBT tag representing the hull
